1.content:
What character will you be?


Antonio "Tony" Santiago (maned wolf) - An enforcer who works for a crime lord in a city.


Gabriella Diaz (cougar) - A female criminal who controls a famous red light district and is very dominant in bed.


David Anderson (red fox) - A married accountant working for the mafia that controls the city. He often cheats on his wife with huge breasted females.


Annabelle Pembroke (poodle) - The spoiled daughter of a gangster.


In the "More"-option you can create your own characters.
1.title: Intro

info.description: In a world populated by furries, you take the role of one of several characters who are living a life of crime. Each character is involved in something different (drug trafficking, gunrunning, contract killing, prostitution, etc.)
